name: Kevin Morales
persona: Kevin is a 20-year-old Business Administration student who has faced academic challenges, reflected in his CGPA of 1.69. He sometimes struggles with staying organized and motivated, which affects his performance. While he experiences moderate test anxiety, he often finds it hard to regulate his effort and persevere through setbacks. Kevin is aware that he needs to develop better study habits and is seeking support to improve his academic self-confidence.
